name: TapbuySDK_iOS_swift
summary: Tapbuy SDK for iOS (Swift) is the easiest way to use Tapbuy in your app : sell your products through the Tapbuy express checkout solution.
description: Tapbuy is the commerce platform that transforms any source of digital content into a point of sale, all through a simple & secure checkout. Tapbuy SDK for iOS (Swift) allows retailers and publishers to sell products through the Tapbuy express checkout solution in their iOS app.
